Addin.Name: Cake.FileHelpers
Addin.Author: Jonathan Dick
Addin.Description: A set of aliases for Cake to help with simple file operations such as Reading, Writing and Replacing text.

Addin.Name: Cake.Xamarin
Addin.Author: Jonathan Dick
Addin.Description: A set of aliases for Cake to help with Xamarin projects.

Addin.Name: Cake.Slack
Addin.Author: WCOMAB
Addin.Description: Cake Addin that extends Cake with Slack messaging features.

Addin.Name: Cake.Powershell
Addin.Author: SharpeRAD
Addin.Description: Cake addin that extends Cake with Powershell command support.

Addin.Name: Cake.IIS
Addin.Author: SharpeRAD
Addin.Description: Cake addin that extends Cake with IIS support.

Addin.Name: Cake.WebDeploy
Addin.Author: SharpeRAD
Addin.Description: Cake addin that extends Cake with WebDeploy commands for publishing to IIS.

Addin.Name: Cake.MSBuildTask
Addin.Author: Mark Walker
Addin.Description: Adds ability to run any MSBuild task from a Cake script.
